text: The 2008 European Mixed Curling Championship was held from September 22 to 27, 2008 at the Mercedes Benz Sportpark in Kitzbühel, Austria.RESULTS - European Mixed Curling Championships 2008 - 28 September 2008 SportFocus news Germany, skipped by Rainer Schöpp won its first title, defeating Czech Republic in the final. ==Teams== The teams are as follows: {| class="wikitable" |- !Country !!
